What is Galio Framework?

Free & Open Source

The Galio Framework Framework is a, 100% free, open-source project, licensed under MIT. It will always remain free to use, powered by a huge international community.

Beautifully designed

Carefully crafted. Ready-made components, typography, and a gorgeous base theme that adapts to each project. You'll be building in style.

First-class Documentation

Built with real app examples, component demos, guides, and how-toâ€™s to get you up and running with mobile apps faster than ever before.

Built as a framework from the ground up.

Creating your mobile app from scratch with dedicated designers and developers can be very expensive. Using Galio Framework you get everything you need to start creating your fully functional mobile app in just minutes.

A selection of interfaces built with Galio Framework

Try it before judging

Galio Framework comes with tons of ready-to-use features & components. The samples consist of a several pages that you can use "as is" or add new blocks from the UI Kit.

Star Fork

For developers

Start building your mobile app in no time. Simply select the components you like and start customising to suit your needs.

For designers

Build an app you love. 200+ individually designed components, each with a specific purpose.

How much money do you need
to build a mobile app?

As much as we would like to give an accurate cost of app development, we can only come up with an estimate, simply because each app development process involves many factors that collectively influence the final cost.

Preview on Expo.io

Scan to open

With an Android phone, you can scan the above QR code with your Expo mobile app to load this project immediately.

Typing @galio-framework/galio-native-kit inside of Expo Client will also open this project.
